effect.short: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
effect.full: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.

flavorTexts.text:
The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its
Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
